languages.text: "Это — не "пустующая техническая постройка", а неактивная резервная крипта для хранения хладагента и холодильного оборудования. Это же очевидно. Твоя несведущесть угнетает, слуга".

traits.locale_text: "Это — не "пустующее техническая постройка", а неактивная резервная крипта для хранения хладагента и холодильного оборудования. Это же очевидно. Твоя несведущесть угнетает, смерд".

languages.text: "This is not an empty utility building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freezing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."
languages.original_text: "Это — не "пустующая техническая постройка", а неактивная резервная крипта для хранения хладагента и холодильного оборудования. Это же очевидно. Твоя несведущесть угнетает, слуга".

traits.locale_text: "This is not an empty technical building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freexing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."
"This is not an empty technical building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freexing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."
"This is not an empty utility building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freezing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."
"This is not an empty utility building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freezing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."
"This is not an empty utility building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freezing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."

languages.text: 「これは空の公共施設ではない。運用されてはいないが、保存用冷却剤と冷凍設備に代わる地下室だ。見れば分かるものを。うんざりするほど物を知らぬな、従者殿」
languages.original_text: "This is not an empty utility building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freezing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."

traits.locale_text: 「これは空の公共施設ではない。運用されてはいないが、保存用冷却剤と冷凍設備に代わる地下室だ。見れば分かるものを。うんざりするほど物を知らぬな、従者殿」

languages.text: “这里并不是闲置的公共设施建筑，而是暂未使用的备用储藏室，用来存放制冷剂与冷冻设备。这一点简直是显而易见。你的无知真让人沮丧，仆人。”
languages.original_text: "This is not an empty utility building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freezing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."

traits.locale_text: “这里并不是闲置的公共设施建筑，而是暂未使用的备用储藏室，用来存放制冷剂与冷冻设备。这一点简直是显而易见。你的无知真让人沮丧，仆人。”

languages.text: «Esto no es un edificio de suministros vacío, sino un almacén de reserva inactivo para artilugios de refrigeración y congelación. Salta a la vista. Tu ignorancia es deprimente, siervo».
languages.original_text: "This is not an empty utility building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freezing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."

traits.locale_text: «Esto no es un edificio de suministros vacío, sino un almacén de reserva inactivo para artilugios de refrigeración y congelación. Salta a la vista. Tu ignorancia es deprimente, siervo».

languages.text: "Das ist kein leeres Versorgungsgebäude, sondern eine inaktive Ersatzkrypta zur Lagerung von Kühlmittel und Gefriergeräten. Das ist doch offensichtlich. Eure Unwissenheit ist deprimierend, Handlanger."
languages.original_text: "This is not an empty utility building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freezing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist kein leeres Versorgungsgebäude, sondern eine inaktive Ersatzkrypta zur Lagerung von Kühlmittel und Gefriergeräten. Das ist doch offensichtlich. Eure Unwissenheit ist deprimierend, Handlanger."

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas un bâtiment technique vide, mais une crypte de secours servant à stocker du réfrigérant et de l'équipement de congélation. C'est pourtant évident. Vous faites preuve d'une ignorance navrante, serviteur. »
languages.original_text: "This is not an empty utility building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freezing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas un bâtiment technique vide, mais une crypte de secours servant à stocker du réfrigérant et de l'équipement de congélation. C'est pourtant évident. Vous faites preuve d'une ignorance navrante, serviteur. »

languages.text: "Bu boş bir kamu hizmeti binası değil, soğutucu ve dondurucu teçhizatların depolandığı, hâlihazırda kullanılmayan bir mahzen. Böyle olduğu çok açık. Cehaletin düşündürücü hizmetkâr."
languages.original_text: "This is not an empty utility building, but an inactive backup crypt for storing refrigerant and freezing equipment. This is obvious. Your ignorance is depressing, servant."

traits.locale_text: "Bu boş bir kamu hizmeti binası değil, soğutucu ve dondurucu teçhizatların depolandığı, hâlihazırda kullanılmayan bir mahzen. Böyle olduğu çok açık. Cehaletin düşündürücü hizmetkâr."
